thread.title: Best Places for Mother's Day Brunch in Vancouver
thread.title_full: Best Places for Mother's Day Brunch in Vancouver

title: Best Places for Mother's Day Brunch in Vancouver
text:
Mother's Day Brunch in Vancouver, BC Top Spots for Mother's Day Brunch in Vancouver By Dana Lynch Updated May 07, 2016 . 
There are so many fantastic options for Mother's Day Brunch in Vancouver that it's no wonder it's local tradition! From lavish hotel buffets to brunches at great locations (where you can make a day of it), to the city's top brunch spots for amazing food, this Guide to Mother's Day Brunch in Vancouver will help you plan the perfect day to celebrate Mom. 
For more dining options, check out the Top 10 Things to Do on Mother's Day in Vancouver , which includes Best Afternoon Teas in Vancouver and fine dining options. 
Mother's Day is Sunday, May 8, 2016 . Mother's Day Brunch at the Pan Pacific Hotel Vancouver. Image Courtesy of Pan Pacific Hotel Vancouver 1. Go Lavish: Mother's Day Brunch at Vancouver Hotels 
Many of Vancouver's luxury hotels go all-out for Mother's Day Brunch, with lavish buffets (and dessert buffets) that will exceed expectations. These foodie extravaganzas feature everything from omelet stations to local seafood to delectable pastries.
